com.sri.kernel
Class SR4Kernel

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      com.sri.kernel.SR4Kernel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class SR4Kernel
extends java.lang.Thread

This is the main class for the SR4 Kernel. For each SR4 Kernel component, it creates the component, sending it any needed information. See the various get functions to retrieve needed functionality from the kernel.

Version:
1.5
Author:
Joseph Monti, Smart Robots

Nested Class Summary
 class SR4Kernel.ShutdownThread
          An inner-class to enable gracefull shutdown when unexpectadly killed

Constructor Detail

SR4Kernel

public SR4Kernel()
Initializes all SR4 kernel components and loads autoloaded modules

Method Detail

run

public void run()
This function keeps the kernel running. It creates a shutdown hook to enable graceful shutdown and then waits until it is shutdown

getLogger

public Logger getLogger()
Returns the Logger used by the kernel. It is made available to allow kernel components to use a common log file

getModuleLoader

public ModuleLoader getModuleLoader()
Returns the module loader used by the kernel.

getSRML

public SRMLManager getSRML()
Returns the srml manager used by the kernel

getI2C

public I2CManager getI2C()
Returns the I2C manager used by the kernel

getConfig

public Configuration getConfig()
Returns the Configuration used by the kernel

getDiagnostics

public Diagnostics getDiagnostics()
Returns the diagnostic engine used by the kernel

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
This is the main entry point of the SR4 Kernel. It will instantiate a new kernel and start the kernel thread.
